text: Khamani Griffin (born August 1, 1998) is an American actor, who is best known for playing Bobby James in the series by UPN/The CW, All Of Us, and Tolee the Koala in Ni Hao, Kai-Lan. He starred as Ben Hinton in Daddy Day Care (2003) and had a role in Norbit (2007). He has also appeared in Grey's Anatomy, ER, and My Name Is Earl. He has been nominated for three Young Artist Awards, for Daddy Day Care and All of Us. He also made an appearance in Lil' Kim's video download. Khamani had a main role on the popular game show, Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader?, until its series finale on September 18, 2009. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !!
